name: tsenso GmbH

Global open data for agriculture - godan.info
goal:
tsenso is active in the area of supply chain monitoring solutions with a strong focus on foodstuff.
In our latest research project, FreshIndex, we developed a solution to provide more accurate and dynamic information on the true quality, safety and shelf-life of fresh and ultra food products, such as fruits, fish and meat.
tsenso is aiming to reduce EU
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Consumers, Digital economy and society, Food Safety, Transport
